foreignData.name: Wohlwollendes Präsent
foreignData.text:
Bestimme einen Gegner. Du und jener Spieler erzeugt je drei 1/1 weiße Geist-Kreaturenspielsteine mit Flugfähigkeit.
Bestimme einen Gegner. Du erhältst für jede Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, 2 Lebenspunkte dazu, und jener Spieler erhält für jede Kreatur, die er kontrolliert, 2 Lebenspunkte dazu.

foreignData.name: Ofrenda benevolente
foreignData.text:
Elige un oponente. Ese jugador y tú crean cada uno tres fichas de criatura Espíritu blancas 1/1 con la habilidad de volar.
Elige un oponente. Ganas 2 vidas por cada criatura que controlas y ese jugador gana 2 vidas por cada criatura que controla.

foreignData.name: Offrande bienveillante
foreignData.text:
Choisissez un adversaire. Ce joueur et vous créez chacun trois jetons de créature 1/1 blanche Esprit avec le vol.
Choisissez un adversaire. Vous gagnez 2 points de vie pour chaque créature que vous contrôlez et ce joueur gagne 2 points de vie pour chaque créature qu'il contrôle.

foreignData.name: Offerta Benevola
foreignData.text:
Scegli un avversario. Tu e quel giocatore create ognuno tre pedine creatura Spirito 1/1 bianche con volare.
Scegli un avversario. Guadagni 2 punti vita per ogni creatura che controlli e quel giocatore guadagna 2 punti vita per ogni creatura che controlla.

foreignData.name: 尊い捧げ物
foreignData.text:
対戦相手１人を選ぶ。あなたとそのプレイヤーは飛行を持つ白の１/１のスピリット・クリーチャー・トークン３体をそれぞれ生成する。
対戦相手１人を選ぶ。あなたはあなたがコントロールしているクリーチャー１体につき２点のライフを得て、そのプレイヤーはそのプレイヤーがコントロールしているクリーチャー１体につき２点のライフを得る。

foreignData.name: Oferenda Benevolente
foreignData.text:
Escolha um oponente. Você e aquele jogador criam, cada um, três fichas de criatura Espírito branca 1/1 com voar.
Escolha um oponente. Você ganha 2 pontos de vida para cada criatura que você controla e aquele jogador ganha 2 pontos de vida para cada criatura que ele controla.

foreignData.name: Великодушное Подношение
foreignData.text:
Выберите оппонента. Вы и тот игрок создаете по три фишки существа 1/1 белый Дух с Полетом.
Выберите оппонента. Вы получаете 2 жизни за каждое существо под вашим контролем, а тот игрок получает 2 жизни за каждое существо под его контролем.

foreignData.name: 善心乐施
foreignData.text:
选择一位对手。你和该牌手各派出三个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。
选择一位对手。你每操控一个生物，你便获得2点生命，且该牌手每操控一个生物，他便获得2点生命。

foreignData.name: 善心樂施
foreignData.text:
選擇一位對手。你和該玩家各派出三個1/1白色，具飛行異能的精靈衍生生物。
選擇一位對手。你每操控一個生物，你便獲得2點生命，且該玩家每操控一個生物，他便獲得2點生命。

name: Benevolent Offering
originalText:
Choose an opponent. You and that player each create three 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.
Choose an opponent. You gain 2 life for each creature you control and that player gains 2 life for each creature they control.

rulings.text: In some unusual cases, the Spirit tokens will have a toughness of 0 or less as they enter the battlefield, perhaps because an opponent controls an enchantment that gives your creatures -1/-1. Because state-based actions aren't performed in the middle of a spell's resolution, you'll gain 2 life for each of those Spirit tokens. After Benevolent Offering has finished resolving, the Spirit tokens will die and subsequently cease to exist.
You may choose the same opponent for each of the effects, or you may choose different opponents. None of the affected players are targets of the spell.
You choose the opponents for each effect as the spell resolves.

text:
Choose an opponent. You and that player each create three 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.
Choose an opponent. You gain 2 life for each creature you control and that player gains 2 life for each creature they control.
